Hellsteed
Jaugrel, the Nights Chill
Only bones remain of their mortal forms, protected from attack by barding.
Driven mad by the stench of blood, they are eager to trample their prey into the dirt.
The unholy combination of warp-tech, cathayan engineering and absolute insanity has created an unstable instrument of death.
Covered in heavy barding and spikes, to tear the flesh of their foes.
Driven mad by the stench of blood, they are eager to trample their prey into the dirt.
The great Ice Drake felled by Greasus Goldtooth that earned him the title 'Drakecrush', Yuwei Xiaolin encountered his bones and rotten corpse during his travels. Now he rides him to war.
Barded Skeletal Steed
Undead Longma
Only bones remain of their mortal forms, protected from attack by barding.
Driven mad by the stench of blood, they are eager to trample their prey into the dirt.
A magnet to Dark Magic, the cart draws power from the land to raise the dead or improve their fighting prowess.
Its brazier burning with supernatural flames, the cart spits Warpstone – and the madness therein – upon enemy Wizards in its path.
Some corpse carts have a great bell mounted upon them, its ominous knell drawing the dead back to shambling Unlife.

Sorcerous constructs of sinew, bone, and metal, empowered by magic.
